title: Ep. 391: How to Be a Smarter Foot Owner with Medical Pedicurist Marcela Correa
itunes:title: Ep. 391: How to Be a Smarter Foot Owner with Medical Pedicurist Marcela Correa
description:
You will never look at your feet the same way again after listening to our interview with medical pedicurist Marcela Correa, the owner of MediPedi NYC. You’ll learn why water is the enemy of a good pedicure; how to train your toenails to grow straighter; what it really takes to stop nail fungus; why exfoliating foot peels are problematic; the best (and worst) at-home pedicure tools; and how to shop for shoes that won’t hurt your feet. All that, plus Marcela is a blast to hang out with…enjoy!

  • Shop the products mentioned on Ep. 391: shopmyshelf.us/fatmascara
  • Links and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
  • Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand
  • Social media: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit
  • Submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation and be featured on the show: email info@fatmascara.com or leave a voicemail at 646-481-8182

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
